column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Luckily for the bf and myself
column2: we were in the area early on a saturday morning
column3: so we showed up within 30 minutes of it opening. So
column5: no wait! We were promptly seated in a cute booth
column6: fit for two (and only two). I did notice the full bar (not the bar in front of the chefs in the back) in front
column7: which was completely empty at the time
column9: but decided against it as I wanted the complete experience of the restaurant
column10: seeing as it was our first time.
